name: ECHOES OF EMBER
description: Born from the underground scene of Portland, Echoes of Ember blends raw alternative rock with atmospheric post-punk, creating a sound that's both haunting and electrifying. Since 2019, the band has been tearing through stages and igniting crowds across the Pacific Northwest and beyond.

members.name: Alex Voss
members.bio: The voice and vision behind the band. Alex's raw, emotive vocals cut through every track with urgency and depth.

members.name: Maya Chen
members.bio: A self-taught shredder with a love for atmospheric textures. Maya's riffs are the backbone of the band's signature sound.

members.name: Jordan Blake
members.bio: Laying down the low-end thunder. Jordan brings groove and grit to every performance with relentless energy.

members.name: Sam Torres
members.bio: The heartbeat of Echoes of Ember. Sam's precision and power drive the band's explosive live shows.
